idea-plugin.name: Promptly
idea-plugin.description:
Promptly is a JetBrains IDE plugin that integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) directly into your coding environment.
  • Connect to your preferred LLM (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.)
  • Chat with AI directly within your IDE
  • Generate and insert code snippets from AI suggestions
  • Provide context-aware assistance based on your current project
  • Securely store your API keys locally
